TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Capture extends System.Object

summary.span: 代表單一子運算式成功擷取的結果。

span.span: Represents the results from a single successful subexpression capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件是不可變的而且沒有公用建構函式。A object is immutable and has no public constructor. 傳回執行個體透過物件，它由`Match.Captures`和屬性。Instances are returned through the object, which is returned by the `Match.Captures` and properties. 不過，`Match.Captures`屬性提供關於相同之相符項目的資訊物件。However, the `Match.Captures` property provides information about the same match as the object. 如果您不會套用至擷取群組，屬性會傳回具有單一提供為相同的擷取的相關資訊的物件物件。If you do not apply a to a capturing group, the property returns a with a single object that provides information about the same capture as the object. 如果您沒有將數量詞套用至擷取群組， `Group.Index`， `Group.Length`，和`Group.Value`屬性提供的最後一個擷取群組的相關資訊，而中的物件提供所有資訊擷取子運算式。If you do apply a quantifier to a capturing group, the `Group.Index`, `Group.Length`, and `Group.Value` properties provide information only about the last captured group, whereas the objects in the provide information about all subexpression captures. 這個範例將提供說明。The example provides an illustration. ## Examples 下列範例會定義規則運算式比對不包含任何標點符號除了句號的句子 (「。")。The following example defines a regular expression that matches sentences that contain no punctuation except for a period ("."). [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Capture.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.capture.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Capture.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.capture.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] 規則運算式模式 `((\w+)[\s.])+` 的定義如下表所示。The regular expression pattern `((\w+)[\s.])+` is defined as shown in the following table. 請注意，在規則運算式中，將數量詞 （+） 會套用至整個規則運算式。Note that in this regular expression, a quantifier (+) is applied to the entire regular expression. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`(\w+)`|比對一個或多個文字字元。Match one or more word characters. 這是第二個擷取群組。This is the second capturing group.| |`[\s.])`|比對空白字元或句點 ("。")。Match a white-space character or period (".").| |`((\w+)[\s.])`|比對一或多個文字字元後面接著空白字元或句點 ("。")。Match one or more word characters followed by a white-space character or period ("."). 這是第一個擷取群組。This is the first capturing group.| |`((\w+)[\s.])+`|比對一個或多個文字字元或字元，後面接空格字元或句號 ("。")。Match one or more occurrences of a word character or characters followed by a white-space character or period (".").| 在此範例中，輸入的字串包含兩個句子。In this example, the input string consists of two sentences. 如輸出所示，第一個句子包含只有一個文字，所以物件具有單一物件，代表做為相同的擷取物件。As the output shows, the first sentence consists of only one word, so the object has a single object that represents the same capture as the object. 第二句包含多個字，所以物件只包含最後一個相符子運算式的相關資訊。The second sentence consists of multiple words, so the objects only contain information about the last matched subexpression. 群組 1，代表第一個擷取，而包含在關閉期間句子中的最後一個字。Group 1, which represents the first capture, contains the last word in the sentence that has a closing period. 群組 2，代表第二個擷取，而包含在句子中的最後一個字。Group 2, which represents the second capture, contains the last word in the sentence. 不過，群組中的物件物件擷取每一個子運算式相符項目。However, the objects in the group's object capture each subexpression match. 物件擷取的第一個擷取群組集合中包含每個擷取的文字及泛空白字元或期間的相關資訊。The objects in the first capturing group's collection of captures contain information about each captured word and white-space character or period. 擷取的第二個擷取群組集合中的物件包含擷取的每個單字的相關資訊。The objects in the second capturing group's collection of captures contain information about each captured word.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Index As Integer
public: property int Index { int get(); };

summary.span: 在原始字串中找到擷取的子字串的第一個字元之位置。

span.span: The position in the original string where the first character of the captured substring is found.

value.span: 在原始字串中找到擷取的子字串之以零起始的開始位置。

span.span: The zero-based starting position in the original string where the captured substring is found.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Length As Integer
public: property int Length { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得所擷取子字串的長度。

span.span: Gets the length of the captured substring.
The length of the captured substring.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 擷取已透過呼叫 屬性從輸入字串擷取的子字串。

span.span: Retrieves the captured substring from the input string by calling the property.
The substring that was captured by the match.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ToString` 是實際的內部呼叫屬性。`ToString` is actually an internal call to the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Value As String
public: property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 從輸入字串取得擷取的子字串。

span.span: Gets the captured substring from the input string.
The substring that is captured by the match.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果呼叫或方法時，無法找出相符項目，傳回的值`Match.Value`屬性是。If a call to the or method fails to find a match, the value of the returned `Match.Value` property is . 如果規則運算式引擎無法比對擷取群組。If the regular expression engine is unable to match a capturing group. 傳回之值`Group.Value`屬性是。the value of the returned `Group.Value` property is . 請參閱取得說明第二個範例。See the second example for an illustration. ## Examples 下列範例會定義規則運算式比對不包含任何標點符號除了句號的句子 (「。")。The following example defines a regular expression that matches sentences that contain no punctuation except for a period ("."). `Match.Value`屬性會顯示結果字串，其中包含相符的句子，每個相符項目。The `Match.Value` property displays the result string, which consists of a matched sentence, for each match. `Group.Value`屬性會顯示每個擷取群組的結果字串，會包含該擷取群組所擷取的最後一個字串。The `Group.Value` property displays the result string for each capturing group; it consists of the last string captured by that capturing group. 屬性會顯示每個擷取的結果字串。The property displays the result string for each capture. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Capture.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.capture.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Capture.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.capture.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] 規則運算式模式 `((\w+)[\s.])+` 的定義如下表所示。The regular expression pattern `((\w+)[\s.])+` is defined as shown in the following table. 請注意，在規則運算式中，將數量詞 （+） 會套用至整個規則運算式。Note that in this regular expression, a quantifier (+) is applied to the entire regular expression. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`(\w+)`|比對一個或多個文字字元。Match one or more word characters. 這是第二個擷取群組。This is the second capturing group.| |`[\s.])`|比對空白字元或句點 ("。")。Match a white-space character or period (".").| |`((\w+)[\s.])`|比對一或多個文字字元後面接著空白字元或句點 ("。")。Match one or more word characters followed by a white-space character or period ("."). 這是第一個擷取群組。This is the first capturing group.| |`((\w+)[\s.])+`|比對一個或多個文字字元或字元，後面接空格字元或句號 ("。")。Match one or more occurrences of a word character or characters followed by a white-space character or period (".").| 在此範例中，輸入的字串包含兩個句子。In this example, the input string consists of two sentences. 如輸出所示，第一個句子包含只有一個文字，所以物件具有單一物件，代表做為相同的擷取物件。As the output shows, the first sentence consists of only one word, so the object has a single object that represents the same capture as the object. 第二句包含多個字，所以物件只包含最後一個相符子運算式的相關資訊。The second sentence consists of multiple words, so the objects only contain information about the last matched subexpression. 群組 1，代表第一個擷取，而包含在關閉期間句子中的最後一個字。Group 1, which represents the first capture, contains the last word in the sentence that has a closing period. 群組 2，代表第二個擷取，而包含在句子中的最後一個字。Group 2, which represents the second capture, contains the last word in the sentence. 不過，群組中的物件物件擷取每一個子運算式相符項目。However, the objects in the group's object capture each subexpression match. 物件擷取的第一個擷取群組集合中包含每個擷取的文字及泛空白字元或期間的相關資訊。The objects in the first capturing group's collection of captures contain information about each captured word and white-space character or period. 擷取的第二個擷取群組集合中的物件包含擷取的每個單字的相關資訊。The objects in the second capturing group's collection of captures contain information about each captured word. 下列範例會使用規則運算式模式， `^([a-z]+)(\d+)*\.([a-z]+(\d)*)$`、 比對以句點分隔的兩個部分所組成的產品編號。The following example uses a regular expression pattern, `^([a-z]+)(\d+)*\.([a-z]+(\d)*)$`, to match a product number that consists of two parts separated by a period. 這兩個部分組成字母字元後面接著選擇性數字。Both parts consist of alphabetic characters followed by optional numbers. 因為第一個輸入的字串與模式，傳回的值不相符物件的`Value`屬性是。Because the first input string does not match the pattern, the value of the returned object's `Value` property is . 同樣地，當規則運算式模式就無法比對擷取群組，對應的值物件的`Value`屬性是。Similarly, when the regular expression pattern is unable to match a capturing group, the value of the corresponding object's `Value` property is . [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Capture.Value#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.capture.value/cs/value1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Capture.Value#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.capture.value/vb/value1.vb#1)] 規則運算式模式的定義如下表所示：The regular expression pattern is defined as shown in the following table: |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`^`|從字串的開頭開始比對。Begin the match at the beginning of the string.| |`([a-z]+)`|比對一個或多個出現的任何字元 a 到 z。Match one or more occurrences of any character from a to z. 因為規則運算式引擎會傳遞選項時，這項比較不區分大小寫。Because the regular expression engine is passed the option, this comparison is case-insensitive. 這是第一個擷取群組。This is the first capturing group.| |`(\d+)?`|比對零個或一個的一或多個十進位數字。Match zero or one occurrence of one or more decimal digits. 這是第二個擷取群組。This is the second capturing group.| |`\.`|比對常值句號字元。Match a literal period character.| |`([a-z]+`|比對一個或多個出現的任何字元 a 到 z。Match one or more occurrences of any character from a to z. 比較不區分大小寫。The comparison is case-insensitive.| |`(\d)*`|比對零個或多個十進位數字。Match zero or more decimal digits. 單一比對的數字是四個擷取群組。A single matched digit is the fourth capturing group.| |`([a-z]+(\d)*)`|比對一個或多個字母的字元，從 a 到 z，後面接著零個、 一個或多個十進位數字。Match one or more alphabetic characters from a to z followed by zero, one, or more decimal digits. 這是第四個擷取群組。This is the fourth capturing group.| |`$`|結論是比對字串的結尾。Conclude the match at the end of the string.|
